maqras.text: Nun. Fude ni chikai kete, mata kaita mono ni oite chikau
Omo no onkei ni oite, anata wa kichigaide wanai
Iya, hontoni anata ni wa, tsukinai hosho ga arou
Hontoni anata wa, sukona tokusei o sonaete iru
Yagate anata wa miyou, kare-ra mo mata mirudearou
Anata gata no dare ga kichigaidearu ka o
Hontoni anata no omo wa,-do kara mayoi satta mono o, mottomo yoku shitte ora re, mata michibika rete iru mono o mottomo yoku shiri tsukusa reru katadearu
Sorede anata wa (shinri o) hinin suru mono ni shitagatte wa naranai
Kare-ra no negai wa, anata ga ayumiyoru koto de, so nareba kare-ra mo dakyo shitai nodearu
Anata wa, hiretsuna chikai o tateru don'na mono ni mo kutsuju shite wa naranai
Chusho shi, waruguchi o ii aruku mono
zenji o samatage, okite ni somuku tsumibukaimono
ranbo (zangyaku)na-sha, sono soto sujo no iyashi-sha
tomi to (oku no) shijo o motte iru tame ni (sodearu, korera no mono ni shitagatte wa naranai)
Kare ni waga shirushi ga Satoru 唱 Sa reru to,`sore wa mukashi no monogataridesu.' To iu
Yagate ware wa, hana no ue ni yakiin o osudearou
Hontoni ware wa,(kaju)-en no mochinushi o kokoromita yo ni, kare-ra o kokoromita. Kare-ra ga, socho ni sore (kudamono) o shukaku suru koto o chikatta toki ni
(arra no o nozominaraba) to, joken o tsukeru koto o shinakatta
Sore de kare-ra ga nemutte iru ma ni, anata no nushi kara no tenbatsu ga sore o osotta
Sorede asa ni wa, sore wa tsumitora reta yo ni natta
Socho kare-ra wa tagaini sakenda
Moshi shukaku suru nonara anata gata no hata ni isogimashou
Sokode kare-ra wa tei koe ni sasayaki atte dekaketa
Kyo wa hitori no binbonin mo, ano (kaju-en) ni haira sete wa narimasen
Kare-ra wa tsuyoku kokoro ni kimete, asa hayaku deteitta
Daga kare-ra ga sore o mita toki, itta. `Watashi-tachi wa, michi o machigaete iru
Iya, watashi-tachi wa (shukaku-mono o) ubawareta
Kare-ra no naka, sukoshi odayakana hitori ga itta. `Anata gata wa doshite (omo o) tataenai no ka to, watashi ga itta no ni
Kare-ra wa,`watashi-tachi no omo o tataeru. Hontoni watashi-tachi wa fugidearimashita.' To itta
Soko de kare-ra wa, tagaini semeai hajimeta
Kare-ra wa itta. `A kanashi, watashi-tachi wa hontoni oheideshita
Omo wa kore ni kawaru, sara ni yoi (kaju-en) o atae rareru kamo shirenai. Hontoni watashi-tachi wa,(kaigo shite) omo ni tangan shimasu
Kono yona mono ga,(gense no) chobatsudearu. Daga raise no chobatsu wa sarani okina monodearu. Moshi kare-ra ni wakatte itanaraba
Hontoni arra o osoreru mono ni taishite wa,-nushi no omoto ni ki kobi no rakuen ga arou
Ware wa shinjinbukai-sha-tachi o, tsumibito no yo ni atsukau to demo iu no ka
Anata gata wa do shita no ka. Anata gata wa do handan suru no ka
Soretomo anata gata ni wa, manabu ni tariru Keisuke ga aru no ka
Anata gata ga erabu mono wa, nani demo sono Keisuke no naka ni aru no ka
Soretomo anata gata wa, shinpan no hi made yukona seiyaku o wareto musunda no ka. Anata gataga shiryobunbetsu suru koto wa, tashikani anata gata no mono ni naru no ka
(Muhanmado yo) kare-ra ni toe. `Kare-ra no dare ga sore o hosho suru nodesu ka
Matawa, kare-ra wa (omoni) haisuru mono ga aru no ka. Kare-ra ga tadashi nonara, sono haisuru mono o tsurete kitasa se nasai
Sune ga, gen wa ni sa reru hi (o omoi nasai). Kare-ra wa sajida suru yo motome rareru. Daga kare-ra ni wa dekinaidearou
Kare-ra wa me o fuse, kutsujoku o komurudearou. Sajida suru yo, tashika ni kare-ra wa yobikake rarete ita. Sonotoki gotai manzokunanoni (kyohi shita)
Sokode kono o kotoba (kuruan) o kyogidearu to suru mono o ware ni makase yo. Ware wa kare-ra ga kidzukanai homen kara, ippo ichiichi (daraku ni) michibiki
kare-ra o yuyo surudearou. Hontoni ware no keiryaku wa tsuyoku tashikadearu
Soretomo anata ga kare-ra ni hoshu o motome, sore de kare-ra wa futan o kase rareta no ka
Mata yugen-kai ga kare-ra no temoto ni ari, sore de kare-ra wa (sore o) kakikudasu koto ga dekiru no ka
Dakara nintai shite, anata no omo no meirei o mate. Sakana no tomo no yodeatte wa naranai. Kurushi-sa no amari (kare ga) sakenda toki (no yo ni)
Nushi kara no onkei ga kare ni tasshinakattanaraba, kare wa tsumi o owasa re, fumenboku ni fumonochi ni suteraretadearou
Kono yo ni omo wa, kare o erabi seigi no to no hitori to nasa reta
Fushinjin-sha wa keikoku o kiku toki, sono (monosugoi) metsuki de, anata o 凡 Ndo taoren bakari ni suru. Kare-ra wa iu. `Hontoni kare wa tsuka reta monodesu
Daga, kono (kuruan) koso wa, ban'yu no tame no kunkai nihokanaranai
